resources.string: We need this permission to provide the code received in the sms that you send.
We need this permission to scan the QR code.
We need these permissions to get your location and show you the atms that you\'re near.
We need this permission so that you can choose a number from your contacts list.
We need these permissions in order to work in the background and that you can receive notificacions from our service.
We need this permission to be able to use the external storage in some situations necessary.
